data.title: Distinguished members of Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia (UTHM) visited Nagoya Institute of Technology (NITech)
data.meta_description: This is the official web site of the Nagoya Institute of Technology.
data.text:
On 30th October, NITech welcomed the Deputy Vice Chancellor, the Board of Directors, the Director of the Strategic and Quality Management Office, the Dean for Graduate Studies and the Head of the Strategic Planning Department of UTHM.

The Department of Engineering Physics, Electronics and Mechanics and of Frontier Materials of NITech and the Microelectronic and Nanotechnology-Shamsuddin Research Centre (MiNT-SRC) of UTHM concluded an Agreement for Academic Exchange and Cooperation in August 2013.

This visit is aimed at exchanging opinions for the future possibilities of collaborative research and student exchanges between UTHM and NITech.

After the courtesy call to the Executive Vice-President, Dr. Hideki MASUDA, the visitors also met with the President, Dr. Minoru TAKAHASHI.

Then, they had a meeting with related professors of NITech to discuss future active collaborations.

It was a fruitful meeting to enhance the academic exchanges and research collaboration for both UTHM and NITech.

Meeting with the President, Dr. Minoru TAKAHASHI and the Executive Vice-President, Dr. Hideki MASUDA

Picture at the meeting
